C

changeNuts(String, int) - Method in class com.company.PlayGround
this method move to all 8 direction from location of new nut and due to rolls of game change color of nuts (actually change their number) and also keep number of nuts that new nut changed their color in a variable named totalChanges more information on first while loop for moving to left .
checkEmpty(String) - Method in class com.company.PlayGround
a method to check if there is a nut in given location or nut
checkLegality(String, int) - Method in class com.company.PlayGround
this method this method first get i and j based on location then due to 8 direction around this location decide it is valid or not
checkPass() - Method in class com.company.Bot
this method checks each 8 available direction around each nut of other player to check if there is a valid spot or not
checkPass() - Method in class com.company.Player
this method checks each 8 available direction around each nut of other player to check if there is a valid spot or not
checkPassEachSpot(String, int) - Method in class com.company.PlayGround
this method is exactly the changeNuts method and works like it but only difference is in this method we do not change the color we just determine how many changes will happen output of this method will help us with checking a spot is valid or not
